name: 7th International Conference of Advances in Materials Science and Engineering
content: 7th International Conference of Advances in Materials Science and Engineering (MATE 2024) September 13- 14, 2024, Virtual Conference https://mate2024.org/ Scope & Topics 7th International Conference of Advances in Materials Science and Engineering (MATE 2024) will provides a platform to disseminate new ideas and new reMATErch, advance theories, and propagate best practices in the management of value, supply chain management and Public Sector Information Technology, looking across both product and service-based businesses. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Art Conservation Science • Biomaterials, Tissue engineering • Ceramics • Composites • Corrosion • Diffraction Studies • Energy • Fracture of Materials • Magnetic Materials • Materials for Electronics and Photonics • Materials Synthesis & Processing • Materials Theory, Computation and Design • Mechanical Properties • Metals and Alloys • Nanomaterials, Nano particulates and Nanocomposites • Polymers • Self-Assembly • Solar Energy • Surfaces and Interfaces Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by July 06 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal of Advances in Materials Science and Engineering (IJAMSE) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from MATE 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issues of the following journals • Advances in Materials Science and Engineering: An International Journal (MSEJ) Important Dates • Submission Deadline : July 06 2024 • Authors Notification : August 10, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : August 17, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : mate@mate2024.org (or) mateconfe@yahoo.com
